articles.content: The actress's role as love interest Mera in the DC superhero film series has been criticised by supporters of Johnny Depp, after the actor lost his high-profile libel case against the Sun newspaper.… [+1868 chars]

articles.title: I'm A Celeb Hollie Arnold's brother defends her as Ant McPartlin mocks MBE habit - Irish Mirror
articles.description: I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here! star Hollie Arnold's family appeared on Good Morning Britain on ITV to talk about her journey so far, before host Richard Arnold spoke about her MBE
articles.content:
Hollie Arnold's brother and mum have been forced to defend her habit of bringing up her MBE title following fans' criticism.
The British Paralympian, who competes in the F46 javelin category, has be… [+1881 chars]

articles.author: Micha Frazer-Carroll
articles.title: How The Undoing is unravelling the sexy whodunit - The Independent
articles.description: Nicole Kidman and Hugh Grant’s murder mystery has split critics but its pulpy world of privilege and egotists is actually anything but shallow, says our arts columnist Micha Frazer-Carroll
articles.content: Just how much can we trust the people we love the most? Its a nightmarish question, but one that the murder mystery genre plays on most expertly. AndThe Undoing, Sky Atlantics gripping six-part psych… [+7662 chars]

articles.author: By Georgia Simcox For Mailonline
articles.title: Hugh Grant reveals he took a break from acting after developing 'a bad attitude' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The British actor admitted he was 'embarrassed' to begin a hiatus from leading roles after his Hollywood offers dried up, saying on Friday that he developed a 'bad attitude.'
articles.content:
He recently returned to TV screens with a new role in HBO's The Undoing.
And Hugh Grant, 60, has revealed why he took a break from acting after developing 'a bad attitude'.
